Read data

Get file paths

{% raw %} 
COMMENTS_DIR = '../data/comments/by_date/'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
YEAR = 2020
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
comment_paths_year = get_comments_paths_year(COMMENTS_DIR, YEAR)
{% endraw %}

Read comments

{% raw %} 
%%time
comments = read_comm_csvs(comment_paths_year)
